title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even when dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown when the user tries to create a new table group without setting the dataset. This behavior is not in line with the template requirements which specify that the UI should not perform validation.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should still be able to go and define a group. The group dialog should be shown, allowing the user to create a group even when the dataset is not defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is displayed and the user is able to define a group even without a dataset.
